title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta with pancetta, then mix with egg-cheese mixture.
Serve with black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
Simmer tomato puree and spices in a pan.
Add grilled chicken and cream, then cook for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
